text: "Motley Crew" is a song by American rapper Post Malone. The song was released on July 9, 2021. The song was able to make it to #13 on the Billboard Hot 100 and #3 on the Billboard Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs. The title of the song is a reference to the American heavy metal band Mötley Crüe. On July 8, 2021, a music video for the song was released. It was produced by Cole Bennett. In the video, Malone is driving around the Auto Club Speedway in Fontana, California. The music video features cameos from NASCAR drivers Bubba Wallace and Denny Hamlin, Mötley Crüe drummer Tommy Lee, and rappers Saint Jhn, Tyla Yaweh, Tyga, Ty Dolla Sign, Big Sean, French Montana, and Pressa. ==References== ==Other websites== *"Motley Crew" on YouTube Category:2021 songs Category:Post Malone songs
title: Motley Crew (song)
